description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the residential status of a patient.

tr.td: All republics which made up the former USSR
Other republics which made up the former Yugoslavia
Other white European, European unspecified, European mixed

description.value: A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a person's ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

display.value: All republics which made up the former USSR
Other republics which made up the former Yugoslavia
Other white European, European unspecified, European mixed

tr.td: Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found

Number not present and trace not required
Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)

title.value: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status

description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

display.value: Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
Number not present and trace not required

title.value: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Marital Status Code

description.value: An indicator to identify the legal marital status of a Person.

tr.td: Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female)

title.value: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code

description.value: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

display.value: Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female)
